QuestData.Title: Hitting Them Where It Hurts
QuestData.Description: The fel orcs have stockpiled many of their supplies here.$B$BStealing them would be a severe blow to their war effort and a great boon to ours. Are you up to the task, $c?
QuestData.LogDescription: Steal 3 piles of Hellfire Supplies, then return to Stone Guard Stok'ton in Hellfire Ramparts.
QuestData.CompletionText: How many piles were you able to take?
QuestData.RewardText: Well done! The long term effects of this attack will be far worse than slaying a few orcs could ever be.
